A: 1. What does "BONJOUR MONSIEUR" mean? (a) Good afternoon Sir! (b) Good evening Sir! (c) Good morning Sir?
2. What does "AU REVOIR LA CLASSE" mean? (a) Good evening class (b) Good night class (c) Good bye class
3. How do you say "I am delighted to see you" in French? (a) Nous sommes enchanté
4. Levez-vous la classe means what? (a) Class greet (b) Class stand (c) Class sit
5. Merci beaucoup means (a) Thank you very much (b) Welcome (c) Good night
6. Au revoir Monsieur means (a) Thank you very much Sir (b) Good morning Sir (c) Good bye Sir
7. Bonjour mes amies means (a) Good morning children (b) Good morning teachers (c) Good morning friends
8. What does "Donc aide-moi Dieu" mean? (a) So help me God (b) Trust and obey (c) I am a Nigerian
9. What does the sentence "Le Nigeria ne te saluons" mean? (a) I love Nigeria (b) I am a Nigerian (c) Nigeria we hail thee
10. What does the sentence "Notra drapeau sera symbole" mean? (a) I can't see the symbol (b) Our flag shall be a symbol (c) I want to draw a symbol
11. What is "Comme-ci comme-ca" in English? (a) Like this like that (b) Like that like this (c) Like this like this
12. To say "Good morning friends" in French you can simply say (a) Bonjour petit (b) Bonjour mes Amie's (c) Bonjour monsieur
13. To say "Did you sleep well" in French you can simply say (a) Tre Bien dormie? (b) Comment ça va? (c) Comment se passé ke travail?
14. What is "Ferme ta bouche" in English? (a) Close your mouth (b) Open your mouth (c) Clear the bush
15. "Repetez encore" means (a) Repeat after me (b) Repeat it again (c) Stand still
16. What does comment tu t'apelle? mean in English? (a) What is her name? (b) What is his name? (c) What is your name?
17. What does the sentence "Donc aide moi Dieu" mean? (a) Praise the Lord (b) To God be the glory (c) So help me God
C: 1. Discuss the importance of learning a foreign language in today's globalized world.
2. Elaborate on the role of French in international diplomacy and organizations.
3. Explain the cultural significance of French cinema and literature.
4. Analyze the impact of French colonization on various regions of the world.
5. Compare and contrast French education system with your local education system.
